title: Understanding Approximate Computing-Based Deep Learning Acceleration Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Deep Learning Principles and Computer Architecture Knowledge
context.additional_context: A course for learners interested in advanced computing technologies balancing energy efficiency and computational accuracy, focusing on understanding hardware-software integration approaches for DNN acceleration

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of approximate computing and its application cases for deep learning acceleration
One can analyze the energy efficiency mechanisms of approximate multipliers such as CMUL
One can apply methods to ensure compatibility with approximate hardware through DNN model optimization
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
